channel.title: Html on Jeroen Mols
channel.description: Recent content in Html on Jeroen Mols

item.title: Interactive versionable architecture diagrams
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Tired of building un-versionable, lifeless architecture diagrams? Wouldn’t it be great if you could add your diagram to Git, embed it in your documentation, and have clickable elements?

item.title: A privacy friendly RSVP for events
item.author: info@jeroenmols.com (Jeroen Mols)
item.description: Planning an event can be stressful, and the last thing you need is worrying about your guests’ privacy. But don’t worry, I’ve got you covered with a privacy-friendly RSVP option.
